title: Magnetic flux - through a square plate

content.question: A square plate is placed in a constant magnetic field where the area vector is at an angle <math alttext="45 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>45</mn><mo>Â°</mo></math> to the magnetic field. As the square is rotated, how does the magnetic flux change?

choices.label: The magnetic flux increases or decreases in a linear manner.
The magnetic flux increases or decreases, but not linearly.
How the flux changes depends on the axis about which it is rotated.

content.answer: How the flux changes depends on the axis about which it is rotated.
